statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{14.97}; top has length \displaystyle{9.10}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{8.02} and \displaystyle{8.59}. The height is \displaystyle{7.73}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{9.10}+{8.59}+{14.97}+{8.02}={40.68}.
